Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that include First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation after a revision cycle (e.g., following RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of times First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is immediately preceded by First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation activities that occur within variants ending in Manuscript Export Succeeded for production
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Ratio of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants that originate from SW-EIC Major Revision or SW-EIC Minor Revision decisions
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appears only once per case
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of variants in which First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurs
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation activities that are followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation events occurring after a First Look-Please submit updates activity
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Number of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation activities that appear in the final phase of a variant (i.e., within the last five activities of a trace)
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Ratio of variants containing First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to total number of variants
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that directly follows a revised manuscript acceptance (e.g., RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'
